resources.string: Your distance from home will display here!
This is the channel for Crown Catch Notifications
How do I get more points?
Keep safe by staying away from others and staying close to your house.
(1) Keep social distancing alive! \n Stay relatively close to your house! \n
(2) Keep informed! \n Read the news and see how the situation is evolving! \n
(4) Use this app often to let you do Steps 1 and 2 and 3!
(3) You will feel rewarded for your efforts.
Credits for the poster from OU Medicine: \n https://www.covidoumedicine.com/protecting-your-health/social-distancing/
All Bluetooth Connections will show here. In order to practice good social distancing, it is recommended to have weak connection to nearby phones.

In order to practice good social distancing, you can use one of the tabs above in the toolbar to help you. 
 For each tab, you can choose to: 
 
 1. See a map for how long and how far you are from your house. 
 
 2. Keep up with current news dealing with the coronavirus. 
 
 3. Find other people nearby to keep 6 ft apart from them with Bluetooth connection. 
 
 4. See how many points you have acquired through helping your community in the app!
Be careful, as a precaution you should stay 6 ft away from others. \n Your Bluetooth signal does not show this…

This view only works if people nearby activate their Bluetooth. \nIf this functionality does not work, try scanning for nearby devices using the bluetooth functionality on your navigation bar of your phone.
Bluetooth is not supported on this device.
You have stayed home for 1 hour and now have %2$d points.\nKeep up the good work!
You are currently %1$.2f miles away from your house.
Make sure you fill out your location.
As a precaution, it is best to stay home in the times of a pandemic. \n You are currently %1$.2f miles from your home!"
I\'m sorry. Type in the location again and we will give you a better answer.
Find the latest news from the CDC, FDA and others on the coronavirus.
Make sure your Internet is on to obtain recent news!
Remember to have your location feature on to access this feature!
The search found zero results. Check if you are located in a remote location. This might cause issues for the search. If not, try shifting your position.
No nearby places can be found. Try turning on your network connection or finding a place with suitable Wi-Fi for Internet access.
You have earned 40 points by looking at the news. Thanks for keeping informed!
Congrats! You earned 10 points for finding available restaurants near you. Climb up in the leaderboard by using this feature more frequently.
You are not registered on the leaderboard yet. Would you like to register?
In order to register you for our online leaderboard, we are going to need a little bit of information from you. Your position will update as soon as you finish this dialog.
Fill in your surname here if wanted!
Look at your standings in the leaderboard and try to complete tasks to show your coronavirus survival expertise!
